rows.name: What's wrong?
Heard anything interesting?
How's it going?
Tell me the details.
Leave it to me!
I'll do what I can.
Well, that's a relief.
You don't have to worry anymore.
That sounds pretty bad...

Hmm, this is a problem...
What should I do?

[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]     What's the right move...? I need to
think about this carefully...
I'll help. Will you let me handle it?

Leave it to us!
We'll definitely solve it.

It'll be tough, but someone's got to do it.
We'll take care of it!
I see.
Got it!
Oh, really?
Thanks.
Yeah, yeah...
Are you okay?!
You all right?
It was nothing.
Yeah.
No.
Sorry!

Here, have a Kujiranman Cookie.
Mikumari and Seori made them.
I can't do that...
I'm back.
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]     !
Huh?!
It's okay.
Heh, pretty amazing, right?
I brought it.
Actually...
This is...
What is this...?

Whoa...
That's amazing!
All right!
There's something I want to ask.

Do you know anything about a girl
named Nia, who was recently captured
by the Superbian Empire?

Did you see a Gulan boy
run this way from the port in a panic?

Do you know if there's anything suspicious
going on with the summit meeting between
Superbia and Invidia?
What's wrong?
Got any interesting stories?
How've you been?
I want to know more.
I'll see it through to the end!
Guess I've got no choice!
Phew, that's that done.
That was an easy job.
This looks like a really bad situation.
Hmm, what a pain.
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]     Which one should I choose...?

Why not leave it to us?
I think we can handle it.

I can't just leave you like this.
We'll take care of it.

I think we can help.
Want to give us a shot?
I see...
All right.
Is that so?
Thanks.
Right...
Are you okay?!
You all right?
It's nothing.
Yeah.
No.
Sorry.

Here, have a Kujiranman Cookie.
I think they're pretty good.
No way.
I'm back.
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]     !
Huh?!
No problem.
Of course.
Brought it.
The thing is...
Is this...
What's this?
Huh, not bad.
Nice!
There's something I want to ask.
Did you see a Gulan thief, a young boy?

Have you heard any fishy stories about
the summit between Superbia and Invidia?
What is wrong, mo?
Tell Tora the story, mo!
Hello, mo!
Tell me more details, mo.
Leave it to Tora and friends, mo!

Tora will try, mo.
Don't get hopes up, mo.
And with that, case is closed, mo!

You can rest easy now, mo.
Sleep soundly tonight, mo.

This is bad, mo...
We can't just stand around, mo.

Mo-mo-mo!
This is certainly a predicament, mo.

The time has come for a once-in-a-lifetime
decision, mo...

That problem...
Tora and friends will solve it in a flash, mo!

With Tora and friends helping,
it'll be solved in no time, mo!

Tora...no, leave it to Boss and friends, mo.
I'm sure they'll figure something out, mo.
I see, mo.
Understood, mo.
Is that so, mo?
Thank you, mo.
Mooo...
Now that Tora is here, you can rest easy, mo!
Are you okay, mo?
Of course, mo!
Yes, mo.
No, mo.
I'm sorry, mo.

Have a Kujiranman Cookie, mo!
If you don't take it,
Tora will eat it, mo.
It's best to give up, mo.
Sorry for the wait, mo!
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]     !!
Mo-mo?!
No problem, mo.
Heh-heh, mo!
I brought it, mo!
Well, to make a long story short, mo...
Mo-mo...
Mo-mo-mo-mo?
Wow, that's amazing, mo!
All right, mo!
I have a question, mo.

Did you see a Gulan child
who stole something important from Boss, mo?

There's a summit meeting soon, mo?
Tell me if you see anything suspicious, mo.
I've got something to ask you...
Yo, how's it going?
Leave it to us.
That should settle everything.
Sounds like a bad situation.
Should we lend a hand?
I see.
Roger that.
I appreciate it.
Are you alive?!
Is something wrong?
I require information...
How are you faring?
Interesting...
Leave it to me.
Let us try.
That resolves the matter.

There should be no more trouble.
You can rest easy.
This is not a favorable situation.
Hmm... This is a dilemma.
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]     I must make a choice I will not regret...
Shall we lend our aid?
We cannot simply ignore this.

Would you entrust this to us?
I have reliable companions.
Hmm...
Understood.
Is that so?
I thank you.
...I see.
Are you unhurt?!
Are you all right?
It is nothing.
Indeed.
No...
My apologies.

Please accept this.
It is a Kujiranman Cookie.
I must respectfully decline.
I apologize for the delay.
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]     !!
What?!
There is no issue.
It is a simple matter.
Will this suffice?
The truth is...
This is...
What is it?
Oh...
Is this all right?
I have a question.
What's wrong?
Tell me something interesting.
How's it hangin'?
Give me all the details.
Just you wait. I'll be there in a flash.
Hah hah ha! With the Thunderbolt Zeke on the case, this'll be over in a flash!
And now you don't have to worry.
A piece of cake for a man of my talents.
Is this a bad situation?
What a mess.
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]     I need to be careful here...
I'll help you out.
We'll knock this out of the park for you.
The Hr√¶svelgr Mercenary Group accepts this commission!
Makes sense.
Roger, roger.
Is that so?
Thanks.
Yeah, yeah...
Sorry to keep you waiting!
Are you all right?
Don't worry about it.
Right.
Nope.
My bad.

Here, have a Kujiranman Cookie.
No guarantees it tastes good, though.
That's not happening.
We're back.
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]     !
What the...?!
No worries.

When the Thunderbolt Zeke is on the job,
it's a piece of cake.
This is the thing you wanted.
Actually...
Well now...
What's this...?
I see. Not bad.
All right!
I have a question...

Do you know anything about the shady dealings
of a dark merchant operating here in Acedia?

Rex...
Doesn't this sound interesting?

Yeah, it does.
Let's hear the details.
Rex, let's solve this as soon as possible.

Of course. With you by my side, Homura,
I can do anything.
That solves everything, right?
It's all thanks to Nia's hard work.

Zeke-san...
We have to do something, don't we?

If we don't do something,
nothing will get done.

Oh, my...
This is a predicament.

Homura-chan...
Let's put our heads together and find an answer, mo!

Meleph-san...
It seems we have a difficult decision to make.

Indeed...
I must make a choice that I will not regret...
Rex, we're going to help, aren't we?

Of course we are!
We'll give it everything we've got!
Thank you.
Are you hurt?

Now that Hana and friends are here,
you can rest easy, mo!
Will you be all right?

I'm sure it's fine.
You worry too much, Homura.
No, it was nothing at all...
The Heaven's Holy Grail is so modest.
Sorry for the wait.
We have returned.
I've brought it for you.
That was quite an ordeal, wasn't it, Homura?
Will this be all right?
I reckon so!

Hey, Byakko.
I bet this person knows something.

Perhaps. The only way to find out
is to ask, my lady.

That's not enough to go on.
Give us the details.
Hikari likes to stick her nose in everything, mo.

Leave it to us!
We can do it!
Just try not to overdo it...

Rex, I did a good job.
Don't you think I deserve a reward?

Huh?!
Umm, I'll think about it...

Kagutsuchi...
With us here, this was the only
possible outcome, wasn't it?

Of course...
It was a foregone conclusion.

Hmm, this is a tricky one.
What do you think, Hikari?

Worrying about it is a waste of time.
It'll work out somehow!

We'll do it!
Right, Hikari?

If that's what you want, Rex,
I guess I'll give it a shot.
No, no, it was nothing at all, mo.

[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]     Oh... an adult!
She's so much more mature than me!
We're back!
We have returned.
There, there.
This looks good.
Thanks!
What Zeke-sama means to say is, "How are you?"

If you leave it to Tora, it'll all be
over in a flash, mo!
I have high hopes for you, Tora-sama.

For us, this was a piece of cake,
wasn't it?

My lady...
"When victorious, tighten your helmet strings,"
as they say.

This is about as bad as running into
an Oston while you're salvaging.

[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]     Salvaging sounds like a
terrifying profession...

My lady...
I believe we should proceed
with caution here.

Yeah...
I need to make a choice I won't regret.

We must be the ones to do this...
Byakko, will you lend me your strength?
Of course. I would be glad to assist.
Thank you.
Please allow me to express my gratitude as well.
Are you okay?
You can rest easy now.
Are you okay, mo?

[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]     I shall watch over Hana-san
like a proud grandparent and let her
handle this herself.
That went well.
Indeed it did.
It seems they have something to say.
Hana wants to hear the details, mo!

Hana, I want you to ask if they have
any useful information, mo!
Masterpon is being lazy, mo...

Nia...
Hana would like to know more, mo.

Yeah, me too.
Let's hear the details.

Leave it to us!
...Hana, you don't have a feature that can
solve this instantly, do you?

Unfortunately, I do not have a feature
that can meet Saika's expectations, mo.

Is this enough, mo?
Can you rest easy now, mo?

Masterpon worries too much, mo...
I am sure everything is resolved, mo!

Rex...
What should we do in this situation, mo?

I don't know either.
That's why we have to think about it together.

I can't leave someone in trouble, mo...
Leave it to Tora and friends, mo!

Masterpon...
So full of compassion, mo!
Are you all right?
Meleph will take care of it, mo!

It's nothing to make a fuss
about, mo.

For Masterpon to be so modest...
Something bad will happen tomorrow, mo.
I have returned, mo!
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]     So cute...
Greetings, mo.
I'd like to ask you something.

That's not very clear.
We need more details...

Mo.
I would like to hear more, mo.
Can Meleph overcome this situation, mo?

Not alone...
But with your help, Hana,
I believe it's possible.

Phew, that's a relief, mo.
Time for a breather, mo.

Indeed...
Congratulations are in order.

Masterpon...
Could this be...?

Yes, yes...
This is a crisis on par with Tora touching
a Core Crystal, mo!

Homura...
What is the right thing to do in this
situation, mo?

I'm afraid I don't know...
Both paths could be right, or both
could be wrong...

Heh heh heh...
It seems it is time for the Thunderbolt Zeke
to make his appearance.
Hana will help too, mo!

Please rest assured, mo!
Everything is all right now, mo!

When Hana is in this form,
I really feel at ease.

I'm back...
Am I late?

It seems they have waited for us,
undaunted by the rain, with a patient and
open heart, mo.
All right, mo!
Mo!
How are you doing, mo?
I would like to ask you something...

Please leave it to Hana, mo.
I would like you to wait with peace of mind, mo.

Yes. I am happy if our strength
was of service.

Hana...
If we combine our strengths, there's
nothing we can't do, right?

Yes, mo!
We are the strongest duo, mo!

Mo-mo-mo!
This is a crisis on par with running out of
my emergency supply of sweet sausages, mo!

Masterpon...
That is not much of a crisis, mo.

This will not be easy.
What should we do...?

Rex,
let's think about it together, mo!

Hana...
What should we do in this situation, mo?

Please do not ask Hana, mo...
How about Masterpon decides, mo?

Masterpon...
I believe we can handle this if we borrow
the strength of our Blade friends, mo.

Mo-mo!
Hana has a good idea, mo!
Are you all right?
I'm a little worried, mo.
I have returned from a long journey, mo.
...That was pretty tiring.

Hana...
The item...

The item...? Oh, this is what was
requested, mo.
Tell me something cool.
I'm looking forward to it, mo!

I'm in top form!
How about you?

Suzaku...
That's enough with the pleasantries.
Let's just listen to what they have to say.
Rex, this looks like a worthwhile job.

Yeah.
Let's stay sharp and get it done.
Keee!

You startled me...
Don't just squawk like that.
Was that a victory cry?

Hmm...
A situation that won't be easily resolved...

But...
it doesn't look like there's nothing
we can do, either!

I'll take this case!
Right, Nia?

That was my intention, too...
We'll solve this by working together.
Is this a job for Suzaku, mo?
No, let's leave this to our mercenary group.

It was nothing!
Kee-ke-keee!
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]     Not very humble, mo...

I've brought what you asked for.
The left bag or the right bag...
Which one do you think it's in?

We don't need all that.
Just hand it over normally.
All right!
As expected!

Kagutsuchi...
What's the proper greeting at the
Superbian Imperial Palace, mo?

First, spread your hands to the sides,
then take the hem of your skirt...
No, let's just listen for now.

Leave it to us.
Kagutsuchi... I'm counting on you
again this time.

Yes...
I will be sure to meet Meleph-sama's expectations.

Ha ha ha!!
Ha ha ha ha ha!!
I think she's trying to say it was easy.

What a problem, mo...
Kagutsuchi, what should we do
in a situation like this, mo?

Hana, you are still young...
With more experience, it will be easier
to find the answers.
Meleph-sama...

I know what you want to say, Kagutsuchi.
...We will take this on.

Thank you, mo, thank you, mo!
Thank you, mo, thank you, mo!!

Even something precious can lose its impact
if you repeat it too much.
Are you all right?!

Now that we are here,
you can rest easy.
I wonder if they're okay.
I wonder.
Of course.

But it's embarrassing to be praised...
Heheh.
Will this be all right?

Thank you.
That's a great help, Kagutsuchi.

Saika...
Should we hear them out?
Sounds good. Let's do it.
Let's question this person, mo.

What are you talking about?!
We're just asking, just asking.

Hey...
Tell me a story so funny
it makes my sides hurt.

That sounds difficult.
Don't expect too much.

We can't just ignore this.
What do you think, Saika?

I agree with you, Prince.
We can't overlook this.

Saika, this might be a tough fight,
but let's do our best!

In a pinch, we have the Prince's Eye
of the Overlord, so we'll definitely be fine!

Rest easy.
It's all become rust on the blade of my
Purple Lightning Mark III Thunder.
That's my Prince for you!

Saika...
Hana thinks this is...
a not-so-good situation, mo.
I agree with Hana.

Do not worry.
We shall lend our aid.

[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]     That casual confidence and dignity...
That's what my Prince is lacking.
Are you all right?!

It would be great if the Prince's Ultimate
Rising Slash could turn the tide...
Hey, are you all right?

[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]     That kind and pure feeling...
My Prince has lost that.
Is something wrong, mo?
It might be trouble.

Let's ask if they have any useful
information.
I hope we hear something interesting.

Leave it to me.
I will see it through,
with Kagutsuchi by my side.

Indeed...
You can count on us.
I suppose we can call this settled.

Wadatsumi...
Good work.

It seems we're faced with a difficult
decision...

You should struggle with it.
That is how you will grow.

Wadatsumi...
What would you do?

Is there any question?
Of course, we must lend a hand.
Did we make it in time?!

It's all right.
I will protect you.
We didn't do anything special.

So modest...
You're just like Nefer-sama.
I'm back.
Sorry to keep you waiting.
Will this be all right?

Yes...
There should be no problem.
With this, the world will be at peace!

We didn't do anything that great, mo...
We just took care of a small problem, mo!

I can hear it...
The voice of someone in need of a hero!

It certainly seems to be an unfavorable
situation.
It seems it's our turn.

Yes, leave it to us!
Justice will always prevail!
Did we make it in time...?

Now that we're here,
you can rest easy!

We've kept you waiting!
We're back!
Glen, you're a bit overbearing!
Give us your juicy info!

So, tell us something interesting.
Or you might regret it.

Raaaargh!
How is it?!

Please don't be afraid.
He is just asking how you are.

Please be at ease, mo.
With Jikarao here, he'll take care of it, mo.

Raaaargh!
I'll do it!

Roooaaar!
Rest easy!

Hah hah...
I guess you don't have to worry anymore.
I...want to help...

Jikarao, I feel the same way.
Let's help them.

It'll be tough, but we have to do something...
Vasara, no acting on your own this time.
...Understood.
Case closed!

Thanks to Vasara's efforts,
it was surprisingly easy.

Vasara...
What do you think we should do here?
I simply trust in your choice.

Vasara...
Will you go with them?
As you wish.
Get the item from the furry one here.

Mo-mo?!
Tora is giving it, mo?!
What happened?

This doesn't seem like small talk.
Now, tell us the details.

Meleph...
This is an interesting story.
Yes, we must hear the details.

If you leave it to Yuou, it's a piece of cake.
Just relax and wait.

Heh...
Of course, I'll need your help too, Zeke.
I'm counting on you.
Yuou, what do you think?

I think we should lend a hand.
This is something only we can do.
Are you okay?

You can tell Yuou anything, mo.
He'll do something about it, mo.

Peasant...
Tell me an amusing story.

Um...
If you could just tell us normally, that'd be fine.

A request for me...
How audacious.

Heh...
We should accept it without complaint.
Easing the people's anxieties is also our duty.

It's okay now!
We solved it with ease.

Heh heh heh...
Thanks to me, of course.
This favor will cost you dearly. Remember that.

Mo-mo-mo...
What should I do, mo?
A difficult choice, mo...

Listen, boy...
To stand frozen by indecision
is the height of folly.

There is no need for me to act.
Let some common Blade handle it.

We'll take it for now.
We'll decide who does it later.
Right, Kubira?
Got any interesting rumors?

Idaten would rather hear a delicious rumor,
po!

With Idaten on the case,
it'll be solved in a flash, po!

I'm counting on you...
Just try not to get sidetracked by
some tasty treat along the way.
This is a bad situation, isn't it...

Idaten prefers delicious situations,
po!

We will take this on.
Right, Idaten?

Idaten would be delighted,
as long as there's a tasty reward, po!

Thank you, mo!
I feel like giving you 10 sweet sausages
as thanks, mo.
I feel like eating them, po!

Is there something you want to talk about?
But I'm sorry,
I have to turn down any confessions.
I don't think that's the mood here...

Hey, how are you?
Me, I'm doing great.
See? I'm cute today, too.

Tora is also in top form, mo!
Except when Tora eats too much and gets a
stomachache, mo!

With this, the problem is solved.
It was all thanks to Hotaru's efforts...

Ehehe...
I'm not just cute, you know.

What should I do...?
What do you think, Hotaru?

Eh, don't ask me.
I trust your choice, Nia.

All right, we'll help.
Right, Hotaru?

[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]     ...You just love sticking your nose
into trouble, don't you?

Excuse me, could you tell us any useful information?
By the way, Tora-san, where exactly
are a Nopon's ears?

This wing-like thing is my ear, mo!
But right now, we should be listening to you, mo!

Let's do our best, Rex-san!
But just in case, let's buy a lucky charm
before we go.

No, I don't think we need a charm...
We need to solve this problem as quickly as possible.

This is a terrible situation!
Let's get a lucky item right away!

Kasane...
Somehow, I don't think that will solve
the root of the problem.

Let us help.
Is that all right, Meleph-san?

Yes, I have no objection.
Let us follow Kasane's kind heart.

We must lend a hand!
Right, Zeke-san?

That's the spirit.
We've got the power of the mercenary group, after all.

Mikumari seems very interested...
Are you curious?

I am...
Tell me all the details!
This feels tough...

But if we combine our strengths,
we can do it!

That was a piece of cake, right,
Rex?
Yeah, thanks to you and everyone else, Mikumari!

This is our kind of job.
My arms are itching for a fight...

Yeah...
My Eye of the Overlord is tingling...

You're safe now!
Leave it to us!

That's the Flamebringer for you.
So reliable!
I wonder what happened.

Rex...
Go and ask.

Leave it to us!
We'll solve it in no time.
Right, Seori?

Yes...
We will do our utmost.
This is a difficult problem...

Indeed.
We must act calmly and carefully.

Seori...
I think I want to help.
...I feel the same way.

Mmm...
What do you think, Seori?
I'm a little worried...

It is in times of hardship that we must
combine our strengths and press forward!

You're right, Tokiha.
We can do this!

That should settle things.
I'm glad, aren't you, Tokiha?
I'm just glad we could be of some use!

Tokiha...
It seems the time has come to lend our strength.

Indeed.
Let us face this with all our heart and soul!

Hah hah ha!
For the Thunderbolt Zeke,
this is nothing!

Zeke, if I may be so bold, should you not
try to be more humble?

Please accept this.
This is the item you requested.

Oh!
Tokiha is so polite and kind, mo!
I want you to teach Hana, mo!

I have a feeling we're going to have a fun chat!
With my conversational skills, I'll get all the
facts and fictions out of you!
Just the facts would be fine...

I'm Zakuro...
If you have any good info, I'd love to hear it.
And I'd love for you to hear my stories, too!

Zakuro...
Sorry, but your stories will have to wait.

How have you been lately?
Anything interesting happen?
As for me, the other day...

This is going to get long, so stop!
Let's just listen this time.
Let's hear the relevant details.
Yeah, just the relevant ones!

Leave it to Tora and friends, mo!
With Hana and Zakuro here, you're perfectly safe, mo!
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]     Somehow, this group doesn't inspire much confidence...!

Hey, Hikari...
I'm going to do so well on this,
I'll outshine you!

Trying to show off for your Driver, are you?
Maybe I should get serious, too...?
Well, that's that settled.

You can sleep soundly tonight.
I'm glad!

In the hands of the Flamebringer,
it was an exceedingly simple matter!
Just kidding.
I certainly do not think that!

Isn't this an exciting development?
Right, Rex?

Yeah...
It's a bad situation, but we have to do something.

Grown-up, adult Hana-san...
What do you think we should do here?

I think it is best for everyone to worry
together, mo.
This is a tough one...

Do what you think is right, Rex.
I and everyone else will trust your judgment!

Zeke can solve this in an instant with the
power of his Eye of the Overlord!
Right?

W-well...
Yeah, but I don't think I need to use the
Eye of the Overlord for this.

We'll solve this in a flash!
After all, we're the strongest party!

Right, mo!
Leaving it to Tora and friends is the best choice, mo!

Zakuro, do you think we can handle this
if we borrow everyone's strength?

I think so!
We can solve it in a jiffy
while having a fun chat.
Thank you, I appreciate it.

[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]     I wish I had Kagutsuchi's elegance
and adult composure...

Are you okay?!
The Thunderbolt Zeke has arrived,
so you can rest easy!

Ha ha ha!
Sorry to keep you waiting!
Um, are you okay, mo?

[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]     Hana-chan is so kind and cute.
I hope she never grows up.
It was nothing at all.

A humble Rex...
So cool!

I'm back!
Were you bored while you were waiting?
You're so patient.

I must admit, it's hard to imagine you
staying still in one place, Zakuro-san...

Sorry for the wait!
I brought it!
So, what naughty things are you planning to do with it?

It's probably not going to be used for
anything bad...
...probably.
All right, mo!
Please don't copy me, mo...

With Azami's Clairvoyant Eye,
maybe we don't even need to ask?

No...
I want to use this power as much as possible
to watch only my dear Driver.

Tell me the details quickly.
Otherwise, I'll peer into every corner of your being.

You should just talk.
Azami might actually do it.

My time with my dear Driver was wasted
for your sake.
You should be a little grateful.

It created time for Azami and her Driver to
be together...
Why not think of it that way?

Fufufu...
